No blurring

width, height = 280, 175

distance = 48...
xShift, yShift = 0., 0.

mTarget: 0.26x
mRecovery: 0.26x

for i in range(NofP):
    mRes[i,:] = cp.asarray([3*listX[i]*listY[i]*np.cos(listX[i]/4)/mPixelX/mPixelY,
			4*listX[i]*listY[i]*np.cos((listX[i]-listY[i])/6.464)/mPixelX/mPixelY,
			4*listX[i]*listX[i]*np.sin(listX[i]/6.464+0.56)*np.cos(listY[i]/6.464-0.3)/mPixelX/mPixelY])
bExp = cp.tensordot(matrixA,mRes,axes=([2,4],[0,1]))

repeat:
	5000	2	2
	1000	0	0
	1000	2	2
	2000	0	0
